DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Changes Skin Carotenoid Scores Medical Students Following Dietary Supplement-based Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: This current project interventional , non-invasive study examine change skin carotenoid level time individual increase carotenoid intake take dietary supplement contain know amount carotenoid . After two-week control period eat normal diet , forty medical student meeting study inclusion criterion ask take dietary supplement eight week period time . Students give twin-sachet packet LifePak Nano supplement contain five capsule ( dry ingredient ) two CR-6 Liponutrient softgel capsule ( liquid ingredient , include omega-3 fatty acid nanosized carotenoid ) . These take twice day eight ounce liquid morning evening meal . SCS measure every 2 week . At end period , student ask discontinue dietary supplement intake follow usual diet 2 week SCS measure .
